00021 typedef struct _upk_json_string {
00022     char                   *c_str;
00023     char                   *esc_str;
00024 } upk_json_string_t;

00026 typedef struct _upk_json_type {
00027     uint8_t                 type;
00028     union {
00029         bool                    bl;
00030         double                  dbl;
00031         int                     i;
00032         upk_json_string_t       str;
00033         struct json_object     *obj;
00034     } val;
00035 } upk_json_val_t;
00036 
00037 typedef struct _upk_json_stack_node upk_json_stack_node_t;
00038 typedef                 UPKLIST_METANODE(upk_json_stack_node_t, upk_json_stack_meta_p), upk_json_stack_meta_t;
00039 typedef void            (*upk_json_handler_t) (upk_json_stack_meta_t * meta, void *data, char *key,
00040                                                upk_json_val_t v);

00043 typedef struct _upk_json_stack_handlers {

00045     upk_json_handler_t      json_bool;
00046     upk_json_handler_t      json_double;
00047     upk_json_handler_t      json_int;
00048     upk_json_handler_t      json_string;
00049     upk_json_handler_t      json_array;
00050     upk_json_handler_t      json_object;
00051     upk_json_handler_t      after_json_obj_pop;
00052     upk_json_handler_t      after_json_array_pop;
00053 } upk_json_handlers_t;

00058     upk_json_handlers_t     handlers;
